name: Cut Transition
description: Instant transition between shots with no intermediate frames, creating immediate change

prompt.base: Cut transition, instant change between shots, direct transition, no intermediate frames, immediate switch, standard editing cut, sharp transition, instantaneous change
prompt.positive: cut transition, instant change, direct switch, immediate transition, sharp cut, no fade, instantaneous, standard editing, clean cut, abrupt change, quick transition
prompt.negative: fade transition, dissolve effect, gradual change, slow transition, crossfade, wipe effect, smooth blend

technical.use_cases: Standard editing, maintaining pace, action sequences, dialogue

variations.name: Match Cut
variations.modifier: visual or thematic match between shots, creative connection, graphic match, conceptual link

variations.name: Jump Cut
variations.modifier: temporal discontinuity, same subject different time, energetic pacing, modern style

variations.name: L-Cut / J-Cut
variations.modifier: audio leads or follows video, smooth audio transition, professional editing, seamless flow

examples: A direct cut from close-up to wide shot, instant transition, maintaining scene continuity
A match cut between similar shapes in different scenes, creative instant transition
